label: Handshake
value: Have a firm handshake.

label: Eye contact
value: Look people in the eye

label: Singing
value: Sing in the shower.

label: Stereo
value: Own a great stereo system.

label: Fight
value: If in a fight, hit first and hit hard.

label: Secrets
value: Keep secrets.

label: Hope
value: Never give up on anybody. Miracles happen everyday.

label: Acceptance
value: Always accept an outstretched hand.

label: Bravery
value: Be brave. Even if you're not, pretend to be. No one can tell the difference.

label: Whistling
value: Whistle.

label: Sarcasm
value: Avoid sarcastic remarks.

label: Life's Mate
value: Choose your life's mate carefully. From this one decision will come 90% of all your happiness and misery.

label: Kindness
value: Make it a habit to do nice things for people who will never find out.

label: Books
value: Lend only those books you never care to see again.

label: Hopefulness
value: Never deprive someone of hope; it might be all they have.

label: Children's Games
value: When playing games with children, let them win.

label: Second Chance
value: Give people a second chance, but not a third.

label: Romance
value: Be romantic.

label: Positivity
value: Become the most positive and enthusiastic person you know.

label: Relaxation
value: Loosen up. Relax. Except for rare life-and-death matters, nothing is as important as it first seems.

label: Phone Etiquette
value: Don't allow the phone to interrupt important moments. It's there for our convenience, not the caller's.

label: Losing Gracefully
value: Be a good loser.

label: Winning Gracefully
value: Be a good winner.

label: Friendship
value: Think twice before burdening a friend with a secret.

label: Hugs
value: When someone hugs you, let them be the first to let go.

label: Modesty
value: Be modest. A lot was accomplished before you were born.

label: Simplicity
value: Keep it simple.

label: Risk
value: Beware of the person who has nothing to lose.

label: Relationships
value: Don't burn bridges. You'll be surprised how many times you have to cross the same river.

label: Regrets
value: Live your life so that your epitaph could read: No regrets.

label: Boldness
value: Be bold and courageous. When you look back on life, you'll regret the things you didn't do more than the ones you did.

label: Love Expression
value: Never waste an opportunity to tell someone you love them.

label: Gratitude
value: Remember no one makes it alone. Have a grateful heart and be quick to acknowledge those who helped you.

label: Attitude
value: Take charge of your attitude. Don't let someone else choose it for you.

label: Visits
value: Visit friends and relatives when they are in the hospital; you only need to stay a few minutes.

label: Morning Ritual
value: Begin each day with some of your favourite music.

label: Scenic Route
value: Once in a while, take the scenic route.

label: Valentine Cards
value: Send a lot of Valentine cards. Sign them, 'Someone who thinks you're terrific.'

label: Phone Call Etiquette
value: Answer the phone with enthusiasm and energy in your voice.

label: Ideas
value: Keep a notepad and pencil on your bedside table. Million-dollar ideas sometimes strike at 3 a.m.

label: Respect
value: Show respect for everyone who works for a living, regardless of how trivial their job.

label: Flowers
value: Send your loved ones flowers. Think of a reason later.

label: Random Act of Kindness
value: Make someone's day by paying the toll for the person in the car behind you.

label: Heroism
value: Become someone's hero.

label: Marriage
value: Marry only for love.

label: Gratitude
value: Count your blessings.

label: Hospitality
value: Compliment the meal when you're a guest in someone's home.

label: Children Interaction
value: Wave at the children on a school bus.

label: Success in Work
value: Remember that 80% of the success in any job is based on your ability to deal with people.

label: Fairness
value: Don't expect life to be fair.
